entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:16 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 12:16 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
